text: Uttar Purush is a 1966 Bengali-language film directed by Chitrakar. The film was remade as Uyarndha Manithan (1968) in Tamil, and Anubandham (1984) in Telugu. ==Cast== * Vasant Choudhury * Rabi Ghosh * Anup Kumar * Amar Mullick ==References== ==External links== * Category:1966 films Category:Indian films Category:Bengali-language films Category:Bengali films remade in other languages Category:1960s Bengali-language films
title: Uttar Purush
